Title: Structure of the Sustainable & Climate Tech Group in Connection with Panasonic Group Structure Transition Effective
Summary: The Heating & Ventilation A/C Company and the Cold Chain Solutions Company of Panasonic Corporation will be reorganized and established as a new operating company "Panasonic HVAC & CC Co., Ltd." effective April 1, 2026, as announced by Panasonic Holdings Corporation on July 30, 2025. The new operating company will have a structure where the current two internal divisional companies and five affiliated companies under Panasonic Corporation's Sustainable & Climate Tech Group are reorganized into three companies. Regarding business operations, Panasonic HVAC & CC Co., Ltd. will take the lead and operate the three companies as an integrated group. Details are as follows:
